description: Mobile techniques mitigated by Do Not Mitigate, ATT&CK mitigation M1059 (v1.0)
name: Do Not Mitigate (M1059)

techniques.comment: [Conceal Multimedia Files](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1628/003) likely should not be mitigated with preventative controls because the `.nomedia` file may be used legitimately.
